### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
- Steam engine at position (not specified, but assumed nearby)
- Offshore pump (not specified, but assumed nearby)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)

### Electricity groups
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group at position (-18.166666666666668, 21.055555555555557)
- Electricity group at position (-17.45, 24.55)
- Electricity group at position (-21.227272727272727, 24.90909090909091)
- Electricity group at position (-17.67241379310345, 23.46551724137931)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure there are no obstructions before attempting to place an electric pole near other entities such as labs or assembling machines.

### Errors related to entity power status
- Check the power connections to ensure entities like labs and assembling machines are receiving power. If they are marked as 'NO_POWER', verify that they are connected to a power source.

### Errors when using undefined names
- Ensure that all entity classes are correctly defined and imported in your code to avoid NameError. For example, use 'ElectricityPole' instead of 'Electric'.

### Repeated errors with power status
- The lab at position (-17.5, 23.5) and the assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) are both marked as 'NO_POWER'. Verify their connections to the electricity network to ensure they receive power.
